title: The Kid

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to Fight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- RB/CTRL Immune
- The first time you Fight a player, roleblock them.
- If a player you've previously fought visits your target, you scare them away.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid your county of rapscallions and varmint.

desc:
Post 5340
*He can neither read nor write; his youthful vigor is dedicated solely to senseless violence.*
